description: Removal of conditions 19, 20, 21, 22 and 23 relating to the retail use of the London Designer Outlet and addition of new confirmatory condition to planning permission ref. 03/3200 (as amended) dated 29 September 2004, for:Outline planning application for:Works for the re-orientation of Wembley ArenaClass A1 (Retail) comprising up to 14,200mý designer retail outlet, 11,800mý sports retailingClass A1/A2 shops/financial and professional services up to 8,000mý (including up to 2,000mý supermarket)Class A1 (Retail) comprising up to 400 square metres of hotel boutique retailClass A3 (Food and Drink), up to 12,700mýClass B1 (a) (b) and (c) Business, up to 63,000mýClass C1 (Hotel), up to 25,400mýClass C1/Sui Generis (Hotel apartments), up to 26,700mýClass C2 (Residential institutions) up to 5,000mýClass C3 (dwellings) up to 277,000mý, (up to 3,727 dwellings)Student accommodation (Sui Generis), up to 16,600mýClass D1 (Non-residential institutions), up to 8,200mýClass D2 (Assembly and Leisure), up to 28,500mý (including the existing Arena of 13,700mý)together with associated open space, public market area (Class A1), hard and soft landscaping, highway and engineering works, electricity sub-station, other utility requirements, other parking and servicing, and improvements to Olympic Way;AND;Reserved matters relating to siting, design, external appearance and means of access for the 3-storey structure to provide car and coach parking
site_name: Land surrounding Wembley Stadium, Royal Route, Wembley, HA9
